mapper.select: select ps.sell_number, pro_number, sell_price, sell_title, option_size, option_color, option_quantity from productsell ps, selloption so where ps.sell_number = so.sell_number and mem_id = '${seller_id}'
mapper.insert: insert into product(pro_number, pro_name, release_date, pro_price, pro_division, pro_vendor ,pro_explain) values('${pro_number}','${pro_name}','${release_date}','${pro_price}', '${pro_division}', '${pro_vendor}', '${pro_explain}')
